doc:
Helenka Pantaleoni https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helenka_Pantaleoni 0 Helen Tradusa "Helenka" Adamowska Pantaleoni (November 22, 1900 – January 5, 1987) was a Polish American silent film actress and humanitarian. She was the founding director of the U.S. Committee for UNICEF, a role that she held for 25 years. Her granddaughter is American actress Téa Leoni. Helen_Tradusa_"_Helenka " Adamowska_Pantaleoni ( November_22_,_1900 – January_5_,_1987 ) was a_Polish_American_silent_film_actress_and_humanitarian . She was the_founding_director of the_U.S._Committee for UNICEF , a_role that she held for 25_years . Her_granddaughter is American_actress_Téa_Leoni .
